CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - New cmdlet for Content Explorer
OldVersion.description: The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows will now return content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
OldVersion.description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - Multi-policy selection
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select multiple Insider Risk Management policies in the "Risk levels for Adaptive Protection" settings to assign risk levels in Adaptive Protection. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
OldVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to
 help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life. This is a duplicate of 380428 and is being removed from the roadmap.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to
 help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
OldVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
OldVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
CurrentVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Granular exclusion
OldVersion.description: Granular exclusion allows admins to adjust and fine tune indicators according to organizational preferences to help tailor the detection of risks that may lead to a potential security incident. For example, admins can configure the indicator “sending email with attachments to recipients outside the organization” to only detect emails sent to personal domains (e.g. outlook.com). In that way, admins can reduce the number of false positives. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
CurrentVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

OldVersion.title: Planner: Increased number of tasks per premium plan in Microsoft Planner
OldVersion.description:
Create and manage up to 1,500 tasks within a Microsoft Planner premium plan (formerly known as a Project for the web project).
More info: https://aka.ms/thenewplanner

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
OldVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description: In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public domain emails
OldVersion.description: In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
OldVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
OldVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
OldVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
CurrentVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
OldVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Fonts in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: We heard feedback from you, our customers, and are adding support for choosing fonts while you compose in Outlook for iOS and Android. There is also improved support for fonts in the reading pane.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Fonts in Outlook for iOS and Android
OldVersion.description: We heard feedback from you, our customers, and are adding support for choosing fonts while you compose in Outlook for iOS and Android. There is also improved support for fonts in the reading pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
OldVersion.description: Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New work location sharing options
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the work location sharing options to include the option of not sharing any location information to other users in the organization. The three supported location sharing options will now be "No location shared," "Only general location shared (Office or Remote)," and "Detailed location shared (Building or desk location information)." The location sharing option will be respected when showing a user's location information coming from Work Hours and Location across Outlook, Places, and Teams experiences. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New work location sharing options
OldVersion.description: This updates the work location sharing options to include the option of not sharing any location information to other users in the organization. The three supported location sharing options will now be "No location shared," "Only general location shared (Office or Remote)," and "Detailed location shared (Building or desk location information)." The location sharing option will be respected when showing a user's location information coming from Work Hours and Location across Outlook, Places, and Teams experiences. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
OldVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Iphone)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set building location in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With work location in Teams now including buildings, make your presence known, coordinate with others, and take advantage of AI-assisted booking in the future. Once enabled and opted-in, your work location can auto-update to a specific building when you connect to a peripheral at a bookable desk or BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
OldVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
CurrentVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
OldVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections experience for Homesite customers
CurrentVersion.description: This feature sets the Home site as the default for the Viva Connections experience in Teams desktop. Once implemented, users will be able to access their organization's Home site through the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop. This change will only apply to customers who have not yet configured a Viva Connections experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live transcription on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: You can control live transcription (start, stop, restart) during a meeting from a Team Rooms on Windows device. The real-time transcript includes each speaker's name and timestamp. You can also change settings including the spoken language, the translated language, and whether the original and translated transcript would show side by side. This feature is available in Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live caption translation in Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: While live captions display in the spoken language by default, on Teams Rooms on Windows, you can now choose the translation language you prefer without affecting what other meeting participants see. This feature is available on Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

CurrentVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item was updated to Rolling out incorrectly. Thank you for your patience. The Content Explorer Export feature has a limitation of exporting data only after drill down to specific location. This update will allow admins to use a new cmdlet within Security & Compliance PowerShell, Export-ContentExplorerData, to export all rows of data for the content that are scanned and shown on the Content Explorer.

CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description: In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance- Enrich triage in Communication compliance with Insider Risk context
CurrentVersion.description: Enhance the triage experience in communication compliance with Insider Risk Insights. This integration provides investigators a deeper understanding of the risk profile of message senders along with a more comprehensive view of the sender's risk severity and historical risk-related actions. With this enriched context, investigators are empowered to make more informed and effective remediation decisions, ensuring a robust compliance posture.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Bulk upload for Priority User Groups
CurrentVersion.description: Insider Risk Management Priority user groups will now support bulk upload capabilities.  An IRM administrator will be able to upload a CSV of UPNs that they would like to add to a new or existing priority user group. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy Nudges to all Copilot SKU users (Seeded and Premium Viva Learning Users)
CurrentVersion.description: All Users having Copilot SKU (Viva Learning Seeded and Premium) will be nudged about Copilot Academy through a notification on Teams. Users will also get a monthly recurring notification in Teams about Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Fonts in Outlook for iOS and Android
CurrentVersion.description: We heard feedback from you, our customers, and are adding support for choosing fonts while you compose in Outlook for iOS and Android. There is also improved support for fonts in the reading pane.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Drag emails into Calendar icon in the app bar to create an event
CurrentVersion.description: Users can drag and drop emails into the Calendar icon on the left app bar of Outlook to create an event. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New work location sharing options
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the work location sharing options to include the option of not sharing any location information to other users in the organization. The three supported location sharing options will now be "No location shared," "Only general location shared (Office or Remote)," and "Detailed location shared (Building or desk location information)." The location sharing option will be respected when showing a user's location information coming from Work Hours and Location across Outlook, Places, and Teams experiences. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Name pronunciation
CurrentVersion.description: You can now record and share the correct pronunciation of your name, promoting inclusivity and helping colleagues avoid mispronunciations. With a click, you can play and listen to your colleagues' name pronunciations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Inline preview of files shared
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can review a file shared in chat and channels in your flow of work. Select ‘preview’ and scroll through the file’s content without leaving the chat or channel.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Android)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Iphone)
CurrentVersion.description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set building location in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: With work location in Teams now including buildings, make your presence known, coordinate with others, and take advantage of AI-assisted booking in the future. Once enabled and opted-in, your work location can auto-update to a specific building when you connect to a peripheral at a bookable desk or BYOD room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
CurrentVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections experience for Homesite customers
CurrentVersion.description: This feature sets the Home site as the default for the Viva Connections experience in Teams desktop. Once implemented, users will be able to access their organization's Home site through the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop. This change will only apply to customers who have not yet configured a Viva Connections experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live transcription on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: You can control live transcription (start, stop, restart) during a meeting from a Team Rooms on Windows device. The real-time transcript includes each speaker's name and timestamp. You can also change settings including the spoken language, the translated language, and whether the original and translated transcript would show side by side. This feature is available in Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live caption translation in Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: While live captions display in the spoken language by default, on Teams Rooms on Windows, you can now choose the translation language you prefer without affecting what other meeting participants see. This feature is available on Teams Rooms Pro.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
CurrentVersion.description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).
